amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of Report 115-559 to clarify that the requirement applies only to proprietary source code related to algorithmic trading, which contains prescriptive information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of Report 115-559 to clarify that the requirement applies only to proprietary source code related to algorithmic trading, which contains prescriptive information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Foster.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
